# Samuel Oshin — Backend Engineer Portfolio

> Python Backend Engineer specializing in AI/LLM infrastructure, RAG pipelines, and distributed systems. 2× HNG Finalist, Top 1-5% of 10,000+ developers.

## Blog Posts

- [Building RAG Pipelines at Scale](https://samueloshin.vercel.app/blog/building-rag-pipelines-at-scale): A deep dive into production RAG pipelines — vector databases, chunking strategies, embedding models, and evaluation frameworks.
- [Python Backend Best Practices in 2026](https://samueloshin.vercel.app/blog/python-backend-best-practices-2026): Battle-tested patterns for building production Python backends — async architectures, dependency injection, structured logging, and more.
